body.p: Maysville, Kentucky, saddle maker. Kentucky native. Married Violet P. Ricketts. Father of Mary L. Ricketts, John Ricketts, Thomas K. Ricketts, Jr., and Anna Ricketts. Saddle and harness maker in Maysville in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Lower District, p. 24; Ila Earle Fowler, Kentucky Pioneers and Their Descendants (Baltimore: Genealogical Publishing Company, 1967), 116.
